00061 void BaseBarcode::setQuietzoneWidths( int left, int right, int upper, int lower )
00062 {
00063         this->quietzoneWidths.clear( );
00064         quietzoneWidths.push_back( left );
00065         quietzoneWidths.push_back( right );
00066         quietzoneWidths.push_back( upper );
00067         quietzoneWidths.push_back( lower );
00068

00077 
00078 void BaseBarcode::addEncodedSymbol( Symbol* symbol, int position )
00079 {
00080         if ( position == 0 ) 
00081         {
00082                 this->encodedSymbols.insert( this->encodedSymbols.begin( ), symbol );
00083         } 
00084         else 
00085         {
00086                 this->encodedSymbols.insert( this->encodedSymbols.begin( ) + position, symbol );
00087         } 
00088 }

00103 #pragma mark --Private internal methods--
00104 
00105 bool BaseBarcode::verifyData ( const string *data )
00106 {
00107         if ( this->verifyLength( data->length( ) ) && this->verifyContent( data ) ) 
00108         {
00109                 return true;
00110         }
00111         cerr << "Data does not pass verification tests" << endl;
00112         return false;
00113 }
00114 
00115 
00116 bool BaseBarcode::verifyLength ( const int length )
00117 {
00118         if ( this->dataLength == -1 ) 
00119         {
00120                 return true; //if there is no length limit
00121         }
00122         if ( this->dataLength == length ) 
00123         {
00124                 return true; //if the requested length meets the comaprison
00125         }
00126         cerr << "Data string length does not pass verification" << endl; //else throw error
00127         return false;
00128 }

00131 
00132 Symbol* BaseBarcode::createSymbol( int st, int ic, int le, int fp, vector<int> *aVector ) //make a new symbol with passed values
00133 {
00134         Symbol *shinyNewSymbol = new Symbol( );
00135         shinyNewSymbol->setSymbolType( st );
00136         shinyNewSymbol->setIntercharGap( ic );
00137         shinyNewSymbol->setLeadingElement( le );
00138         shinyNewSymbol->setForcedPosition( fp );
00139         shinyNewSymbol->setEncodedData( *aVector );
00140         return shinyNewSymbol;
00141 }

00143 
00144 char* BaseBarcode::getXMLToParse( string *fileTitle ) //Safely get the XML file into a c_string
00145 {
00146         char *ft = new char[ fileTitle->length( ) + 1 ];
00147         strcpy( ft, fileTitle->c_str( ) );
00148         ifstream xmlfile ( ft, ios::in );
00149         
00150         vector<string> xmlcontent;
00151         string xmlentry;
00152         string xmltoparse;
00153         
00154         if ( xmlfile.is_open( ) )                                                       //open the file
00155         {
00156                 while ( getline( xmlfile, xmlentry ) )                  //get the data
00157                 {
00158                         xmlcontent.push_back( xmlentry + "\n" );        //add data to vector
00159                 }
00160                 xmlfile.close( );
00161                 
00162                 for ( int i = 0; i < xmlcontent.size( ); i++ )  //iterate through vector into string
00163                 {
00164                         xmltoparse += xmlcontent[ i ];
00165                 }
00166         }
00167         
00168         char * cxml = new char [ xmltoparse.size( ) + 1 ];      //copy string into cstring
00169         strcpy ( cxml, xmltoparse.c_str( ) );
00170         
00171         return cxml;
00172 }
00173 
00174 
00175 vector<string> BaseBarcode::returnDOMValues( rapidxml::xml_node< > *node ) //Return contents of a single named or unnamed node in the DOM
00176 {
00177         vector<string> *returnValues = new vector<string>;
00178         //cout << node->name( ) << ":";
00179         rapidxml::xml_node< > *datanode = node->first_node( );
00180         while ( datanode != 0 ) 
00181         {
00182                 //cout << " - " << datanode->name( );
00183                 rapidxml::xml_node< > *childnode = datanode->first_node( );
00184                 while ( childnode != 0 ) 
00185                 {
00186                         //cout << childnode->name( ) << " is " << childnode->value( );
00187                         string aValue = childnode->value( );
00188                         returnValues->push_back( aValue );
00189                         childnode = childnode->next_sibling( );
00190                 }
00191                 datanode = datanode->next_sibling( );
00192         }
00193         //cout << endl;
00194         node = node->next_sibling( );
00195         
00196         return *returnValues;
00197 }
